Level_1.name: Rage
Level_1.description: You can enter a rage, gaining advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and dealing extra damage with Strength-based attacks.

Level_1.name: Unarmored Defense
Level_1.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

Level_2.name: Reckless Attack
Level_2.description: You can choose to make a reckless attack on your turn, granting advantage on melee attack rolls using Strength but granting advantage to attackers against you until your next turn.

Level_3.name: Primal Path
Level_3.description: Choose a primal path, which grants additional features. For example, Path of the Berserker grants Frenzy, allowing you to make a melee weapon attack as a bonus action when you take the Attack action.

Level_1.name: Spellcasting
Level_1.description: You can cast spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability. You have a spellbook that contains your known spells.

Level_1.name: Arcane Recovery
Level_1.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover spell slots up to a combined Level of 3.

Level_2.name: Arcane Tradition
Level_2.description: Choose an Arcane Tradition, such as School of Evocation, which grants you specific features like Sculpt Spells.

Level_1.name: Spellcasting
Level_1.description: You can cast spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You prepare a list of cleric spells that are available for you to cast.

Level_1.name: Divine Domain
Level_1.description: Choose a Divine Domain, such as Life, which grants you additional spells and abilities related to healing and protection.

Level_2.name: Channel Divinity
Level_2.description: As an action, you can use your Channel Divinity to channel divine energy for various effects depending on your Domain, such as Turn Undead.

Level_1.name: Sneak Attack
Level_1.description: Once per turn, you can deal extra damage when you hit with a finesse or ranged weapon, provided you have advantage on the attack or another enemy of the target is within 5 feet.

Level_1.name: Cunning Action
Level_1.description: You can use your bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide on each of your turns.

Level_2.name: Sneak Attack Improvement
Level_2.description: At Level 2, your Sneak Attack damage increases, allowing you to deal more damage with finesse or ranged weapons.
